ctx: intros f g x H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace f, g : T -> U x : T H1 : forall x : T, f x = g x H2 : continuous f x x0 : U -> Prop The term "x0" has type "U -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "UniformSpace.sort T".

original: intros f g x H1 H2. intros x0. specialize (H1 x0). intros H3 H4. rewrite <- H3. apply H2. apply H4.
